title: 913 22 "Everyone is Annihilated! Kaido's Furious Blast Breath!"Transliteration: "Zen'in Shōmetsu – Kaidō Ikari no Boro Buresu!" (Japanese:全員消滅 カイドウ怒りのボロブレス！) Yusuke Suzuki Tomohiro Nakayama Eisaku Inoue December 8, 2019(2019-12-08)
transformers_text: 913 22 Everyone is Annihilated Kai do's Furious Blast Breath Transliteration Zen ' in Sh mets u Kaid Ikari no Boro Bure su Japanese Yusuke Suzuki Tomohiro Nakayama E is aku Inoue December 8 2019 2019 12 08 The drunken Kai do flies above Ok o bore Town in his dragon form and threatens Shut en maru and all the people in the town Luffy starts running towards the town to rescue them with Law going after him Kin ' em on and Ki ku soon follows when the former learns his wife is in the village However Hawkins arrives and guides Kai do's rampage towards the ruins of Oden Castle were the emperor uses his Blast Breath technique to destroy both it and the mountain top with a single blast of fire as Luffy Law Kin ' em on and Ki ku can only watch in horror
tf_idf_text: everyone annihilate kai dos furious blast breath transliteration zen mets kaid ikari boro bure japanese yusuke suzuki tomohiro nakayama aku inoue december drunken kai fly bore town dragon form threaten shut maru people town luffy start run towards town rescue law go kin soon follow former learns wife village however hawkins arrives guide kai dos rampage towards ruin oden castle emperor use blast breath technique destroy mountain top single blast fire luffy law kin watch horror
